_sText:
An old castle ruins, still used as vineyard and storage.
The terrorists must destroy the grape plants or the biggest vine storage, while the CT's are protecting them.
-----------------------------------
IF YOU NEED VERSION THAT SUPPORT MORE PLAYERS, DOWNLOAD THE UNOFFICIAL v2 FROM HERE:
http://sawo.sourcebg.net/maps/de_castlevile/de_castlevile_v2.rar (40 players max)
This version also fixes two small bugs (the empty area next to T base and the abnormal light pointing at the A side)
-----------------------------------
CUSTOM RADAR INCLUDED!
-----------------------------------
Map by sawo
Map mail: sawo@war3z.org
Map Site: http://sawo.sourcebg.net/
Map Size: 33,0 MB (34 606 098 bytes)
Nav Size: #
TxT Size: Who carez
-------------------------
Credits:
 The 'Elm Tree model for Source' (the bigger one next to the ct base) is made by Tomdon.
          The other custom props (roof details, grapes etc) are made by sappy.
